W17_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Return to the Heavens and search for your next destination.

W17_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_MIDO_WORLDEXIT_100_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Head to the Heavens, then return to Miyako City.

W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_000_DETAIL.text: The spirit here seems quite weak.

W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_100_DETAIL.text: The spirit here seems reasonably powerful.

W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_200_DETAIL.text: The spirit here seems quite strong.

W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_SUI_300_DETAIL.text: A sinister spirit awaits. You'd best be prepared before making your move.

W17_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world teeming with the energy of evil spirits on the other side of the door. If you want to acquire a spirit's power, you'll need to purge the world of evil first.

W17_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: The Emerald Wave connects to the citadel.
